IndexPage.title: FrayerModelTemplate: An AI-generated blank Frayer model template.
IndexPage.description: FrayerModelTemplate is a tool site that dynamically generates blank Frayer model templates based on artificial intelligence, helping students and teachers quickly learn and understand new vocabulary.
IndexPage.placeholderText: Enter or paste the words that need to generate the Frayer Model here, separated by commas...
IndexPage.pDescription: The Frayer Model Template is an educational tool used to help students understand and remember new concepts or terms, generated based on AI.
IndexPage.soraVideoExample: Example template generated by Frayer Model
IndexPage.fakeSoraTip: FakeSora is designed to simulate the OpenAI Sora API that has not yet been released.
IndexPage.soraTip: OpenAI has not yet released the Sora API.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy |
privacyPolicy.desc: Thank you for choosing FrayerModelTemplate! This privacy policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our website.
privacyPolicy.h4_1_pa: a. Personal Data: When you use FrayerModelTemplate, we may collect your name, email address, and payment information for order processing.
privacyPolicy.h4_1_pb: b. Non-Personal Data: We may also collect non-personal data through web cookies to enhance your browsing experience.
privacyPolicy.h4_2_p: We only collect your personal data for the purpose of order processing.
privacyPolicy.h4_3_p: We do not share your personal data with any third party.
privacyPolicy.h4_4_p: FrayerModelTemplate does not intentionally collect any personal data from children.
privacyPolicy.h4_5_p: We will notify users of any updates to this privacy policy via email.
privacyPolicy.h4_6_p: If you have any questions or concerns about our privacy policy, please contact us at:

termsOfService.title: Terms of Service |
termsOfService.desc: These Terms of Service ('Terms') govern your access to and use of FrayerModelTemplate ('Service'), provided by FrayerModelTemplate ('we' or 'us'). By accessing or using the Service, you agree to be bound by these Terms.
termsOfService.h4_1_p: FrayerModelTemplate is a free online tool based on AI that easily generates Frayer Model Templates.
termsOfService.h4_2_p: The ownership of the templates generated from words belongs to the original user.
termsOfService.h4_3_p: We collect and store user data, including names, emails, and payment information. We process this data in accordance with our privacy policy.
termsOfService.h4_4_p: We use web cookies to collect non-personal data. For more information, please refer to our privacy policy.
termsOfService.h4_5_p: Our privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and disclose information about you. By using our Service, you agree to our privacy policy, which can be found at the following URL:
termsOfService.h4_6_p: These Terms are governed by the laws of the United States.
termsOfService.h4_7_p: We may update these Terms from time to time. We will notify users of any significant changes via email.
termsOfService.h4_8_p: If you have any questions or concerns about our Terms of Service, please contact us at:

indexQuestion.h2_1: What is the Frayer Model Template
indexQuestion.h2_1_p1: The Frayer Model Template is an online tool that dynamically generates Frayer Model templates based on AI.
indexQuestion.h2_1_p2: It generates corresponding Frayer Model templates based on the concepts and terms that users input to understand and remember.
indexQuestion.h2_1_p3: The generated templates build a comprehensive understanding of the concept based on the four parts of the Frayer Model.
indexQuestion.h2_1_p4: The Frayer Model is commonly used in classroom learning to help students deepen their understanding of concepts through comparison and contrast. It can also be used to assess students' grasp of concepts because it requires students to provide definitions, examples, and non-examples.
indexQuestion.h2_2_p1: The Frayer Model is an educational tool used to help students understand and remember new concepts or terms. It builds a comprehensive understanding of the concept through four parts:
indexQuestion.h2_2_p2: 1. Definition: Provide a clear and concise definition of the concept.
indexQuestion.h2_2_p3: 2. Characteristics: List the key attributes or characteristics of the concept, which help distinguish it from other similar concepts.
indexQuestion.h2_2_p4a: 3. Examples: Provide specific examples to illustrate the concept, helping students understand abstract definitions through practical cases.
indexQuestion.h2_2_p4b: 4. Non-examples: Also provide examples, but this time they are examples that do not belong to the concept, helping students understand the boundaries of the concept.
